find_path_v6_fixed.description: Finds a path using BFS on the current map XML, handling walls, objects, and one-way ledge jumps. Returns a JSON array of button strings. Avoids DOOR tiles unless they are the target.

history.commit_message: Simplified player detection and pathfinding logic for better reliability. Corrected XPath queries and coordinate handling.
Removed WATER from obstacle list to allow pathfinding while surfing.
Added logic to avoid DOOR tiles unless they are the target coordinate, preventing accidental warps during pathfinding.

test_sandbox.description: A simple tool to test if the Python sandbox is operational.

manhattan_distance.description: Calculates the Manhattan distance between two points. Used to test Python sandbox health.

add_numbers.description: Adds two numbers to test sandbox health.
